name: Puma
description: Sportswear manufacturer with sponsorship ties to Israeli sports.
reasons: Sponsors the Israel Football Association (IFA) which includes teams based in illegal settlements in occupied Palestinian territories
The IFA violates FIFA's own statutes by allowing settlement teams to play in Israel's national leagues
Continued sponsorship despite international calls to end the relationship with IFA due to human rights concerns
